examples.example: 我轻轻剥开橘子，掰下一瓣放入口中，那酸甜的味道令人愉悦。

translate.english: I gently peeled the orange, broke off a segment and put it into my mouth, and the sweet and sour taste was pleasant.

examples.example: 我送给朋友一瓣心香，祝愿他一切顺利。

translate.english: I send a fragrance of heart to my friend and wish him all the best.

examples.example: 我采下花园里的一瓣鲜花，放在鼻前轻嗅，那迷人的香气让人心旷神怡。

translate.english: I picked a petal of the flower in the garden, put it in front of my nose and sniffed gently, and the charming fragrance made people feel relaxed and happy.
